hints.content:
To find the number of strawberries $\maroonD{\text{Amir}}$ ate, we start with the number of strawberries $\goldE{\text{Deb}}$ ate and subtract $\blueE{5}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ddf3f9d042e094d25f128f710ad098418805095d)

$\goldE{15} - \blueE{5} = \maroonD{\Box}$

Let's subtract to find how many strawberries $\maroonD{\text{Amir}}$ ate.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/817e0fc6a3f6e01d732d51549d4cbca492e1e6d8)

$\goldE{15} - \blueE{5} = \maroonD{10}$

question.content:
Deb ate $15$ strawberries.

Amir ate $5$ fewer strawberries than Deb.

**How many strawberries did Amir eat?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] strawberries
